lyric.verse: Shinkan ganbatteru MISMATCH na sekai kara nukedasu tame ni Aishuu mo rikaiten MESSAGE suru doko ni mo gozaimasen Sukan sukan moo ii aa zenbu sukan Iran iran moo ii aa zenbu iran ROCK TEAM QURULI no kakaeru kunoo Kurai no moo iya kisetsu MELODY tomo ni kudachitte kuno Chiisai no motta keitai mo motta saisho chijimatta kimi to no kyori Hutashikana kyori sore FLYING OR FLYING V iya sore FLYING Nagasanakute ii namida ga kokoro dondon chijimete itta
